title: Input schema for TikTok scraper
description: Scrapes the hashtag searches, profiles and individual posts.

hashtags.title: What TikTok hashtags do you want to scrape?
hashtags.description: Just add TikTok hashtags and the scraper will collect information about users, followers, likes, and more.

profiles.title: What user profiles do you want to scrape?
profiles.description: Add the name of user you want to scrape.

postURLs.title: What videos do you want to scrape?
postURLs.description: Add the URLs of posted videos you want to scrape. You can enter URLs one by one, or you can upload or link to a text file.

proxyConfiguration.title: Set up your proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Automatic proxy and the country of your choice is usually the best option, but you can also select specific proxies, or use your own custom proxies.

maxRequestRetries.title: Max request retries
maxRequestRetries.description: How many times a page will be retried in case of being blocked or other errors.

maxConcurrency.title: Max Concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Max number of allowed instances running in parallel. More instances need more memory!

resultsPerPage.title: Max results per page
resultsPerPage.description: The number of results that will be scraped from every hashtag and profile.
